data.text: HURRY! Get your #FightLyme merch before it disappears Monday! I’m hand-signing the numbered, limited-edition lithos & love every item in this very special line!! 100% net proceeds to @AvrilFoundation to benefit the Lyme community. Buy now at: https://t.co/3pZ3SyG8so https://t.co/lmMkqakRzr

Visit the #FightLyme Virtual Merch booth for a limited time today! Get your exclusive pieces before the show! 
https://t.co/31QrBlExZs https://t.co/DUyoqLUsOa

Sooo @AvrilLavigne was such a big fan of @gkittle46's performance, she surprised him during the @49ers game.🍁 😂

Still waiting for the official collab to drop though. 🤷🎶 

🎥: @49ers https://t.co/GBzHWtLlhJ https://t.co/WKkXfe2YbF

Thank you @OneRepublic @alessiacara for joining @ThisIsRobThomas @WValderrama & me to #FightLyme on 10/24. SO GRATEFUL & can't wait to see your performances during @AvrilFoundation’s first ever virtual concert to support the #Lyme community. Get tix at: https://t.co/0VgR5w8qpB https://t.co/erjlJo2uiU
Less than 48 hours left to enter to win! @AvrilFoundation @CharityStars https://t.co/IvwttBYSZm
Can’t wait to see my friend @ThisIsRobThomas perform at #FightLyme With Avril & Friends…hope you will join us! Get tickets at https://t.co/0VgR5w8qpB https://t.co/Q6n6Uz1vcj
🖤 @yungblud took actual @taylorswift13's "breath away" with his mash-up of 'cardigan' and @AvrilLavigne's 'I'm With You' 🖤 https://t.co/1SMAYPC7iP

Want to meet me virtually before #FightLyme With Avril & Friends? And introduce me during the show? You can! Winner also receives VIP Soundcheck passes + more. Visit https://t.co/q81nYh1qxg to enter now! (Proceeds to @AvrilFoundation to help us #FightLyme) https://t.co/NURUcRsKOZ
So grateful to my friend @WValderrama for helping us #FightLyme https://t.co/Z8yJDmY0ax
Thanks for the love!! https://t.co/xsRcEP6UyI

New social platform Trybe has launched. No more giving away your creativity and time to social media giants. The new way-Social. Be yourself, be with your people, get rewards. See you on there  https://t.co/zLUUGZEA84 https://t.co/JlGt1WG20m

I’m so excited to invite you to join me & some VERY special guests for #FightLyme, a virtual concert to benefit the Lyme community. 100% of proceeds go to @AvrilFoundation @LymeAlliance. Tickets onsale now at https://t.co/0VgR5w8qpB https://t.co/QroS8ujO5m

Just one week left to enter!!

https://t.co/gTNqy9vaN0 https://t.co/2dwBogTx5E

Surprise! To thank you for your support of @AvrilFoundation, I’m going to record a personalized video performance of #WeAreWarriors just for one of you & announce the winner on my birthday! (Proceeds to @AvrilFoundation to #FightLyme. https://t.co/lkJrhnTvmO for more info. https://t.co/AhaPUEGjtV
vote daily let’s win a moon man 🤯👇🏼 https://t.co/nFVrSzgOPW
Love this 🙏🙏🙏 https://t.co/cnXQBcSCf8

.@AvrilLavigne co-wrote “Breakaway” but then passed on recording the song – it became a #Top10 hit for @KellyClarkson and she performed it live on the #SternShow in 2017.

Hear her FULL interview today on #Sternthology: https://t.co/WZqJorFES9 https://t.co/s9vwPOMbAp
To learn more about ways to support CHLA’s response to the Coronavirus Crisis visit https://t.co/3HMYiylbXy #WeAreWarriors #ChildrensLA#TheAvrilLavigneFoundation#VossWorld https://t.co/xgYBONRxEc

So grateful @AvrilFoundation & our friends @vosswater came together to make this donation of 2000+ bottles of VOSS, giving these courageous heroes a much needed hydrating resource while they fight COVID-19. Scroll for a few beautiful moments from the delivery. 2/3 https://t.co/jQgnVMNAoP
Thank you to the amazing frontline warriors @ChildrensLA for all you are doing for children and families during this very difficult time (with so much ❤, as always). 1/3 https://t.co/9qBssDxydZ
Excited to celebrate #CanadaDay with everyone on Wednesday July 1! Tune in at 8pm. You won’t want to miss this! https://t.co/EyzKS9p0qr

Thank you to my amazingly dedicated fans who voted for me for this @TheJUNOAwards two years in a row. I love you guys so much. And thank you to the Junos ! I hope to party with you next year. Xoxox https://t.co/xjlrkg3Jo4
On today's show: a performance by @AvrilLavigne! Also, @NBCThisisUs actor @LonnieChavis joins us. See you soon! https://t.co/G3XXJSpVKv

Honored to be taking part in One Humanity Live! to raise funds for COVID relief efforts w/ Global Gift Foundation & more.. Catch my #WeAreWarriors  performance btwn 12-3pm EST today
https://t.co/hkduazm7lF to watch. #DreamWithUs #OHMLive #Dream4Humanity #TheAvrilLavigneFoundation https://t.co/LsLWOaqFNk
